snippet: Unidentified gunmen sprayed bullets into the headquarters of the New Democracy party in Athens, adding to a wave of politically motivated violence.
abstract: Unidentified gunmen open fire on headquarters of the New Democracy party in Athens, adding to wave of politically motivated violence as Greece struggles with its worst economic crisis in decade.
lead_paragraph: Unidentified gunmen sprayed bullets into the headquarters of the New Democracy party in Athens, adding to a wave of politically motivated violence.

headline.seo: Shots Fired Into Greek Governing Party Offices
headline.main: Shots Fired Into Offices of Greek Governing Party
headline.print_headline: Shots Fired Into Offices Of Greek Governing Party
